Text:
Detta 채r v채l en emulator? Den borde vara i Apps kategorin

Is'nt this an emulator? It should be in the Apps category
This is the Game Boy Advance Emulator for PSP's with 1.5//Dark Alex custom firmware. Right category.

I don't remember who I downloaded it from, but when I ran a virus scan after downloading the VisualBoyAdvance Emulator, VBA/Generic.src showed up as a virus.  I just thought I'd post this to warn people.

Same Here I don't know who it was downloaded from, Avast missed it, but it was malware, completely destroyed my system, steer well clear of these emulators, clever programmers, selling nostalgia, destroying machines, not worth the aggro.
Gibt es diesen Download haben ein Virus? Sie alle von Ihnen wissen?
